nodes.text: The Jedi delegation consisted of four representatives on the Jedi Order stationed on Klatooine, as part of a number of agreed upon concessions demanded by the planet's leadership to accompany their admission into the Galactic Alliance. Negotiated and organized in 44 ABY by Jedi Knight Leia Organa Solo, the delegation consisted of Master Kyp Durron, Master Sothais Saar, a Chev Knight well-known across the galaxy for his stance against the practice of slavery, and Padawan Bandy Geffer, and the Klatooinian female Padawan Raharra Lapti.
